name: Refreshing Path
description: Create a corridor of shadows, granting you and allies in the area Major Expedition, Minor Endurance, and Minor Intellect, increasing movement speed by 30%, as well as Stamina and Magicka Recovery by 15%. Effect persists for 4 seconds after leaving the path.  Heals 674 Health to you and allies in the area every 1 second.
effectLines: Path also heals you and your allies and increases their Magicka and Stamina Recovery.
coefDescription: Create a corridor of shadows, granting you and allies in the area Major Expedition, Minor Endurance, and Minor Intellect, increasing movement speed by 30%, as well as Stamina and Magicka Recovery by 15%. Effect persists for 4 seconds after leaving the path.  Heals $1 Health to you and allies in the area every 1 second.
